item.title: This picture was taken at the start of 2020, back when we had no...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

This picture was taken at the start of 2020, back when we had no idea what the year would hold for us. It’s been hard, particularly for our members who work in food service, in hospitality, and in limpieza, who have not and likely will not receive stimulus checks, even though the immigrant community has been devastated by this pandemic. If you’re feeling generous for the holidays, please consider supporting our members by donating to @/sanctuary-4-all on Venmo or becoming a patron at www.patreon.com/Sanctuary4All ❤️o donate Vemo @Sanctuary-4-all
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoFor 843 days, Oneita and Clive Thompson took sanctuary in two Philadelphia churches to escape Immigration and Customs...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoFor 843 days, Oneita and Clive Thompson took sanctuary in two Philadelphia churches to escape Immigration and Customs Enforcement. The Thompsons are finally out after ICE dropped its deportation order.

cnn.com

A couple hid in two Philadelphia churches for 843 days to avoid deportation. Now they are free

For 843 days, Oneita and Clive Thompson took sanctuary in two Philadelphia churches to escape Immigration and Customs Enforcement. The Thompsons are finally out after ICE dropped its deportation order.For 843 days, Oneita and Clive Thompson took sanctuary in two Philadelphia churches to escape Immigration and Customs Enforcement. The Thompsons are finally out after ICE dropped its deportation order.
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.Miss out on tamales from Yessenia? Jeanette is selling them for pickup...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Miss out on tamales from Yessenia? Jeanette is selling them for pickup at 5:00pm on December 23, just in time for Christmas. You can order at https://ChristmasTamales.paperform.co. Does your family make tamales for Nochebuena o Navidad? Let us know in the comments!

item.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.Orders for pollo con mole & tofu con sabor mexicano close tomorrow. Gaby...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Orders for pollo con mole & tofu con sabor mexicano close tomorrow. Gaby is cooking to raise money for her husband’s appeal. He was deported earlier this year, ...and she’s been supporting their family on her own ever since. It would be difficult even under normal circumstances, but things have been particularly hard due to the pandemic. Despite it all, Gaby has continued advocating for the rights of all undocumented people, from pushing for the encampment in front of GEO over the summer to helping other families with solidarity meals on Saturdays. You can support her by ordering at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co

See More
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Orders for pollo con mole & tofu con sabor mexicano close tomorrow. Gaby is cooking to raise money for her husband’s appeal. He was deported earlier this year, and she’s been supporting their family on her own ever since. It would be difficult even under normal circumstances, but things have been particularly hard due to the pandemic. Despite it all, Gaby has continued advocating for the rights of all undocumented people, from pushing for the encampment in front of GEO over the summer to helping other families with solidarity meals on Saturdays. item.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.Yessenia is selling tamales for Christmas! Growing up she learned to...
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Yessenia is selling tamales for Christmas! Growing up she learned to make tamales with both banana leaves & corn husks. Hojas de maíz 🌽 are more popular in nort...hern and central Mexico, while hojas de plátano 🍌 reign supreme in tamales made further south. In Denver, you’re more likely to see tamales made with corn husks, although those made with banana leaves are becoming more popular. They also tend to be more expensive, as the large banana leaves can hold more tamal. Yessenia is selling them for just $12 by the half dozen. You can order your Christmas tamales at https://SolidarityChristmas.paperform.co.

See More
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.Gaby is selling pollo en mole & tofu con sabor mexicano on December 19....
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All ColoradoSanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Gaby is selling pollo en mole & tofu con sabor mexicano on December 19. Her husband was deported earlier this year, and Gaby’s been working to support their fam...ily on her own ever since. This weekend she’s raising money to help pay for legal fees associated with her husband’s appeal. You can help support her by purchasing food at https://solidaritymeals.paperform.co.

item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado

item.title: Ready for Christmas please support immigrants families
item.content:encoded:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Ready for Christmas please support immigrants families

Sanctuary4All Colorado is in Denver, Colorado.

Yessenia is selling tamales for Christmas! Growing up she learned to make tamales with both banana leaves & corn husks. Hojas de maíz 🌽 are more popular in nort...hern and central Mexico, while hojas de plátano 🍌 reign supreme in tamales made further south. In Denver, you’re more likely to see tamales made with corn husks, although those made with banana leaves are becoming more popular. They also tend to be more expensive, as the large banana leaves can hold more tamal. Yessenia is selling them for just $12 by the half dozen. You can order your Christmas tamales at https://SolidarityChristmas.paperform.co.

See More
item.author: Sanctuary4All Colorado
